title: Eaton Hall, Cheshire
summary: Eaton Hall is the country house of the Duke of Westminster.  It is 1 mile (2 km) south of the village of Eccleston, in Cheshire, England. The house is surrounded by its own formal gardens, parkland, farmland and woodland.  The estate covers about 10,872 acres (4,400 ha).[lower-alpha 1]
